allow: Bash(powershell -Command "python -c ""from app.config import get_settings; s = get_settings\(\); print\(f''API Key length: {len\(s.langsmith_api_key\) if s.langsmith_api_key else 0}''\)""")

Bash(powershell -Command "python -c ""from app.config import get_settings; s = get_settings\(\); print\(f''Vector Store ID: {s.openai_vector_store_id}''\); print\(f''LangSmith API Key set: {bool\(s.langsmith_api_key\)}''\); print\(f''LangSmith Project: {s.langsmith_project}''\)""")

Bash(powershell -Command "python -c ""
from app.config import get_settings
from openai import OpenAI

settings = get_settings\(\)
client = OpenAI\(api_key=settings.openai_api_key\)

# List files in vector store
vs_id = settings.openai_vector_store_id
print\(f''Vector Store: {vs_id}''\)

try:
    vs = client.vector_stores.retrieve\(vs_id\)
    print\(f''Name: {vs.name}''\)
    print\(f''File counts: {vs.file_counts}''\)
    print\(f''Status: {vs.status}''\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''Error: {e}''\)

# List files
try:
    files = client.vector_stores.files.list\(vs_id\)
    print\(f''\\nFiles in vector store:''\)
    for f in files.data:
        print\(f''  - {f.id}: status={f.status}''\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''Error listing files: {e}''\)
""")

Bash(powershell -Command "python -c ""
from app.config import get_settings
from openai import OpenAI

settings = get_settings\(\)
client = OpenAI\(api_key=settings.openai_api_key\)

# Get file details
file_id = ''file-P7F2vQgLWsZsd953DnG8Nf''
try:
    f = client.files.retrieve\(file_id\)
    print\(f''File ID: {f.id}''\)
    print\(f''Filename: {f.filename}''\)
    print\(f''Purpose: {f.purpose}''\)
    print\(f''Bytes: {f.bytes}''\)
    print\(f''Created at: {f.created_at}''\)
except Exception as e:
    print\(f''Error: {e}''\)
""")
